name: Trash Bros
description:
"Trash Bros". A submission by Featherbrick Studios for the UKIE Green Game Jam 2019. Note: All audio is not made by us.

Four play party game featuring recycling, and emphasis on sustainability and endangered animals. Requires Xbox 360 controlers.

Controls

Left Joystick - Move

Right Joystick - Aim Throw

LT - Pick-UP

Press RT + Release LT - Throw

RB - Impulse

A - Jump
